title: Brand Color Strategies
description: Learn how companies use colors in branding

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Companies carefully choose colors for their brands to convey certain values and emotions.

food.title: Food Brands
food.desc: Red and yellow - appetite, energy, joy

strategy.title: Color Selection Strategy
strategy.content: When choosing colors for a brand, it's important to consider the target audience, industry, and desired emotions the brand should evoke.
